p: Selenium is an essential trace element with antioxidant and immunomodulatory effects. Several randomized controlled trials (RCT) and meta-analyses have demonstrated that parenteral selenium may be able to improve clinical outcomes in intensive care unit (ICU) patients and new trials have been published since our last update. Thus, we updated our data with this systematic review on parenteral selenium as single strategy or in combination with other antioxidant micronutrients in the critically ill.
